title: IELTS Listening Part 2: Zoo Volunteering
text: Listen to the coordinator explaining the volunteering program.

questions.prompt: What is the primary duty of the volunteers?
questions.explanation: Sarah says: 'Your primary role will be **visitor assistance**'.

questions.prompt: What color is the volunteer uniform T-shirt?
questions.explanation: She mentions: 'You will be given a special **green** T-shirt'.

questions.prompt: Which animals are involved in the new observation project?
questions.explanation: She states: 'We have a new project starting next month involving our **elephants**'.

questions.prompt: What is the minimum time commitment required?
questions.explanation: She specifies: 'You must be able to volunteer for at least **six months**'.
The perk mentioned is: 'you will receive **free tickets** for your family members'.
